body: An interesting use case.  Unfortunately, I think it risks creating confusion: (4) suggests using `_` to mean "no namespace" as opposed "any namespace".  Your use case is asking for "any localname", so is not consistent with the semantics we're assigning to `_`.   We could consider another character (e.g. `*`).  It probably warrants a separate issue, as I think it's independent of what we do for namespaces.
